attributes.action: License the use of fireworks for public display only on recognised dates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year countless pet and wild animals are killed owing to the random letting off of fireworks. Children, in the main, insist on annoying and terrifying elderly people and pets. There is no end to it and I ask the government to restrict the purchase and use of fireworks to public display only.
I am not against fireworks but I am against their random 24/7 abuse.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "License the use of fireworks for public display only on recognised dates."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
